Hi Ken,

Nice work, I like it. It's very clear and nicely organised.

And yes I'm still lurking! Recently I've been thinking about different
types of model (as opposed to the standard 'node with sigmoid' model),
improvements in gradient descent such as RMSProp, and whether there's merit
in running GD on a network but with an evolved weight learning rule.

RMSProp is worth looking into if people haven't encountered it. I was quite
surprised that such a simple improvement hadn't emerged earlier (willing to
summarise if folks are interested).

Colin

_,_
>

--f46d043891b3bd01600515706833
